```
text = 'The ADJECTIVE panda walked to the NOUN and then VERB. A nearby NOUN was unaffected by these events.'
wordsFile = open('words.txt','w')
wordsFile.write(text)

wordsFile = open('words.txt','r')
newWordFile = open('newwords.txt','w')
content = wordsFile.read()

wordReplace = ['ADJECTIVE', 'NOUN', 'VERB', 'NOUN']
length = len(wordReplace)

for i in range(length):
	if wordReplace[i] == 'ADJECTIVE':
		print('Enter an ' + wordReplace[i].lower() + ':')
	else:
		print('Enter a ' + wordReplace[i].lower() + ':')
	new = input()
	content = content.replace(wordReplace[i], new)
	
newWordFile.write(content)
wordsFile.close()
newWordFile.close()
```
